description: District-run schools in CPS are organized into 13 geographic Networks, which provide administrative support, strategic direction and leadership development to the schools within each Network. To view or use these shapefiles, compression software, such as 7-Zip, and special GIS software, such as Goofle Earth, are required. To download this file, right-click the "Download" link above and choose "Save link as."

name: Chicago Public Schools -  Network Boundaries (2014-2015) - Map
